activities: Online and offline customer, independent consultant, and human resources data.  Customer data and independent consultant data is transferred from EEA affiliates to Arbonne International, LLC & US Affiliates (“Arbonne”) (which is located in the United States) or transmitted directly from the EEA customers and independent consultants to Arbonne.  Human Resources data is transferred from EEA affiliates.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, off-line, manually processed, automatically processed, human resources data, independent consultant data, and customer data
recoursemech: Consumers and independent consultants may contact Arbonne directly with privacy complaints or may contact JAMS directly.  Questions or complaints about the way Arbonne and/or its parent, affiliates, or subsidiaries have treated HR-related personal information will be handled internally. If the matter is not resolved through internal Arbonne procedures, then employees will be directed to the state or national data protection authority in the jurisdiction where the employee works.
